verses.verse: And Moses <WH4872> went up <WH5927> from the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124> unto the mountain <WH2022> of Nebo <WH5015>, to the top <WH7218> of Pisgah <WH6449>, that is over against <WH6440> Jericho <WH3405>. And the LORD <WH3068> shewed <WH7200> him all the land <WH776> of Gilead <WH1568>, unto Dan <WH1835>, Pisgah: or, the hill
And all Naphtali <WH5321>, and the land <WH776> of Ephraim <WH669>, and Manasseh <WH4519>, and all the land <WH776> of Judah <WH3063>, unto the utmost <WH314> sea <WH3220>,
And the south <WH5045>, and the plain <WH3603> of the valley <WH1237> of Jericho <WH3405>, the city <WH5892> of palm trees <WH8558> <WH5899>, unto Zoar <WH6820>.

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto him, This is the land <WH776> which I sware <WH7650> unto Abraham <WH85>, unto Isaac <WH3327>, and unto Jacob <WH3290>, saying <WH559>, I will give <WH5414> it unto thy seed <WH2233>: I have caused thee to see <WH7200> it with thine eyes <WH5869>, but thou shalt not go over <WH5674> thither.
So Moses <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of the LORD <WH3068> died <WH4191> there in the land <WH776> of Moab <WH4124>, according to the word <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068>.

And he buried <WH6912> him in a valley <WH1516> in the land <WH776> of Moab <WH4124>, over against <WH4136> Bethpeor <WH1047>: but no man <WH376> knoweth <WH3045> of his sepulchre <WH6900> unto this day <WH3117>.

And Moses <WH4872> was an hundred <WH3967> and twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> when he died <WH4194>: his eye <WH5869> was not dim <WH3543>, nor his natural force <WH3893> abated <WH5127>. natural: Heb. moisture abated: Heb. fled

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> wept <WH1058> for Moses <WH4872> in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124> thirty <WH7970> days <WH3117>: so the days <WH3117> of weeping <WH1065> and mourning <WH60> for Moses <WH4872> were ended <WH8552>.

And Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126> was full <WH4392> of the spirit <WH7307> of wisdom <WH2451>; for Moses <WH4872> had laid <WH5564> his hands <WH3027> upon him: and the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> hearkened <WH8085> unto him, and did <WH6213> as the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872>.
And there arose <WH6965> not a prophet <WH5030> since <WH5750> in Israel <WH3478> like unto Moses <WH4872>, whom the LORD <WH3068> knew <WH3045> face <WH6440> to face <WH6440>,

In all the signs <WH226> and the wonders <WH4159>, which the LORD <WH3068> sent <WH7971> him to do <WH6213> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> to Pharaoh <WH6547>, and to all his servants <WH5650>, and to all his land <WH776>,
And in all that mighty <WH2389> hand <WH3027>, and in all the great <WH1419> terror <WH4172> which Moses <WH4872> shewed <WH6213> in the sight <WH5869> of all Israel <WH3478>.
